docs.title: Pirate MIDI Documentation
docs.text:
Welcome to the Pirate MIDI Docs site. Here you can find documentation for all our products as well as our Device API. This site is a constantly updated resource. If something doesn't match what you're seeing, please make sure to update your firmware to the latest version

Tip

Press / to automatically activate the search box at any time, on any page. Just start typing and press enter

  • User Manuals

    Read through the quickstart guides and detailed documentation for any Pirate MIDI device - new or old

    Go To Manuals

  • Device API

    Use our Device API and create custom third party integrations with any app or device.

    Go To Documentation

  • Technical Support & Troubleshooting

    Here you'll find our technical documentation for troubleshooting, manual firmware updates, and more

    Find Solutions

docs.title: Downloading PDFs
docs.text:
In the top right corner of each page, you'll see a document icon. Click or tap that icon to download a PDF version of the page you're on. There is no feature to download the whole manual in one batch because it changes frequently and we want to make sure you're always up to date with the latest changes.

Some PDFs will generate with a blank page at the start of the document. If you're going to print a hardcopy, you can print a custom range of pages and start from page two to avoid printing the blank page.

docs.title: Still Stuck?
docs.text:
• Use the search box to find settings, commands, mappings, and API details.
  • Contact us via support@piratemidi.com
  • Join our Discord server and ask in the forums
  • Join our Facebook group and make a post

docs.title: Pirate MIDI Device User Manuals
docs.text:
Click on any of our devices below to view our user manual. You can also navigate using the sidebar menus.

Tip

Press / to focus the search box at any time. Use this shortcut to quickly search for a term no matter where you are on the site. Just start typing and press enter.
